name: @nebulr-group/nblocks-ts-client
description: This library contains the low level NBlocks client that is shipped with all of our NBlocks plug-n-play experiences for different technologies.

scripts.npm-publish: npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.npm-publish-beta: npm run build && npm publish --access public --tag beta
scripts.npm-publish-local: npm run build && npm publish --registry http://verdaccio:4873 --tag alpha

author: Oscar Söderlund
